trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when the satellite assembly for the resources of the default culture is missing.
trans-unit.target: 缺少默认区域性的资源的附属程序集时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: The default culture is the culture whose resources are loaded if the appropriate culture-specific resources cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 默认区域性为如果找不到相应的区域性特定资源加载其资源的区域性。

trans-unit.source: By default, resources for the default culture are located in the main assembly, and a <xref:System.Resources.MissingManifestResourceException> is thrown if the resource manager tries to retrieve but cannot find a resource for the default culture.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，默认区域性的资源位于在主要的程序集中，和一个<xref:System.Resources.MissingManifestResourceException>如果资源管理器尝试检索，但找不到默认区域性的资源，将引发。</xref:System.Resources.MissingManifestResourceException>

trans-unit.source: However, the .NET Framework will load the resources for an app's default culture from a satellite assembly if the <xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute> attribute specifies a value of <xref:System.Resources.UltimateResourceFallbackLocation?displayProperty=fullName> for the location parameter.
trans-unit.target: 但是，.NET Framework 将加载应用程序的默认区域性的资源的附属程序集从如果<xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute>属性指定的值<xref:System.Resources.UltimateResourceFallbackLocation?displayProperty=fullName>位置参数。</xref:System.Resources.UltimateResourceFallbackLocation?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute>

trans-unit.source: When this is the case, the MissingSatelliteAssemblyException exception is thrown when the resource manager tries to retrieve a resource of the default culture and the satellite assembly for the culture specified in the <xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute> attribute is missing.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，当资源管理器尝试检索默认区域性和中指定的区域性的附属程序集的资源时引发 MissingSatelliteAssemblyException 异常<xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute>缺少。</xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Note that the exception is thrown by a resource retrieval method such as <xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager.GetString%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager.GetObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and not when the <xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager> object is instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如由资源检索方法引发异常<xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager.GetString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager.GetObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName>，而不<xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager>对象进行实例化。</xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager> </xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager.GetObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager.GetString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: MissingSatelliteAssemblyException uses the HRESULT COR_E_MISSINGSATELLITEASSEMBLY, which has the value 0x80131536.
trans-unit.target: MissingSatelliteAssemblyException 使用 HRESULT COR_E_MISSINGSATELLITEASSEMBLY，其值 0x80131536。

trans-unit.source: MissingSatelliteAssemblyException uses the default <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> implementation, which supports reference equality.
trans-unit.target: MissingSatelliteAssemblyException 使用默认<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>支持引用相等性的实现。</xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the MissingSatelliteAssemblyException class, see the <xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException.%23ctor%2A> constructors.
trans-unit.target: MissingSatelliteAssemblyException 类的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。</xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You should always use the <xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute> attribute to define your app's default culture so that if a resource for a specific culture is unavailable, your application will display acceptable behavior.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 应始终使用<xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute>特性定义应用程序的默认区域性，以便用于特定区域性的资源不可用，如果你的应用程序将显示可接受的行为。</xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException"></xref> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException"></xref>使用默认属性的类。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException>类</xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The localized error message for <xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException>.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|本地化的错误消息以<xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException>。 |</xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException> </xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException"></xref> class with the specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException"></xref>与指定的错误消息的类。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException>类</xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The `message` string.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|`message`字符串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException"></xref> class from serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException"></xref>从序列化数据的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 在反序列化，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象过程中调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 承载序列化的对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination of the exception.
trans-unit.target: 有关源或目标的异常的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException"></xref>使用指定的错误消息和对导致此异常的内部异常的引用的类。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 前一个异常的直接结果应包含中的前一个异常的引用引发的异常，<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性返回相同的值传递到构造函数中，或`null`如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性不会提供给构造函数的内部异常值。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException>类</xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The inner exception reference.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|内部异常引用。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|错误消息字符串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the `inner` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`inner`参数不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>中, 引发当前异常<xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref>处理内部异常的块。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException"></xref> class with a specified error message and the name of a neutral culture.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException"></xref>使用指定的错误消息和非特定区域性的名称的类。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException>类</xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The inner exception reference.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|内部异常引用。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|错误消息字符串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The name of the neutral culture.
trans-unit.target: 非特定区域性的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the default culture.
trans-unit.target: 获取默认区域性的名称。

trans-unit.source: The app's default culture is defined by the <xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序的默认区域性定义的<xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute>属性。</xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For a list of culture names, see the [National Language Support (NLS) API Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048) at the Go Global Developer Center.
trans-unit.target: 区域性名称的列表，请参阅[区域语言支持 (NLS) API 参考](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048)转全局开发人员中心。

trans-unit.source: The name of the default culture.
trans-unit.target: 默认区域性名称。
